mapper.select: SELECT A.BBS_NO, A.CATE, B.NAME CATE_NAME, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.STATUS, CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'S' THEN '공개' ELSE '비공개' END AS STATUS_NAME, A.FIX_YN, A.CUSER, CASE WHEN A.CUSER > 2000000000 THEN '마스터' ELSE (SELECT NAME FROM T_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = A.CUSER) END AS CUSER_NAME, A.CDATE, A.UUSER, CASE WHEN A.UUSER > 2000000000 THEN '마스터' ELSE (SELECT NAME FROM T_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = A.UUSER) END AS UUSER_NAME, A.UDATE FROM T_BBS A INNER JOIN T_CODE B ON A.CATE = CONCAT(B.CODE1, B.CODE2) WHERE BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BBS ( CATE, TITLE, CONTENT, STATUS, FIX_YN, CUSER, CDATE, UUSER, UDATE ) VALUES ( #{cate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{fixYn}, #{cuser}, NOW(), #{cuser}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BBS SET CATE = #{cate}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, STATUS = #{status}, FIX_YN = #{fixYn}, UUSER = #{cuser}, UDATE = NOW() WHERE BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
UPDATE T_BBS SET STATUS = #{status}, UUSER = #{cuser}, UDATE = NOW() WHERE BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.BBS_NO, A.COMMENT_NO, A.COMMENT, A.STATUS, CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'S' THEN '공개' ELSE '비공개' END AS STATUS_NAME, A.CUSER, CASE WHEN A.CUSER > 2000000000 THEN '마스터' ELSE (SELECT NAME FROM T_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = A.CUSER) END AS CUSER_NAME, CASE WHEN A.CUSER > 2000000000 THEN 'Master' ELSE (SELECT MEM_ID FROM T_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = A.CUSER) END AS CUSER_ID, A.CDATE, A.UUSER, A.UDATE FROM T_BBS_COMMENT A WHERE A.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND A.STATUS = 'S'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BBS_COMMENT ( BBS_NO, COMMENT, STATUS, CUSER, CDATE, UUSER, UDATE ) VALUES ( #{bbsNo}, #{comment}, #{status}, #{cuser}, NOW(), #{cuser}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.INO, A.BBS_NO, A.ATTACH, A.ATTACH_ORG_NAME FROM T_BBS_IMG A WHERE A.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} ORDER BY A.INO DESC
